page.title: 05FARMING ON BROADLANDS ESTATE
page.content: Broadlands Farm is situated south of Romsey,to the east of the river Test.It is the largest farm on the Broadlands Estate and includes land outside the area.The farm has a manager who looks after it for the owner,Lord Romsey.It has been in the same family for a long time. The farm is 1000ha,which is very large.Over the last few years it has been enlarged by 200ha:the largest field is 40ha and is a mile long, the smallest is a hectare.The boundaries of the field are wooded so that the appearance of the land is not spoilt. Farming is mixed with some arable and some dairying. There are twenty people working and living on the farm,in the farmhouses and cottages.The farm has a lot of modern equipment and machinery.
